MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso is still ongoing. This is due to on-site delays and we now expect power to be back on by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:55pm on 13th April 2021.
